game.s_dis: Subway Surfers: Buenos Aires takes the endless runner action to Argentina’s capital, playable online unblocked with new city-themed characters, outfits, and hoverboards.
game.l_dis:
Subway Surfers: Buenos Aires – Dash Through the Streets of Argentina

Subway Surfers: Buenos Aires immerses players in the lively streets and landmarks of Buenos Aires. Run, jump, and slide along themed subway tracks, dodging trains and barriers while collecting coins, tokens, and power-ups.

What is Subway Surfers: Buenos Aires?

This World Tour edition features Buenos Aires-themed environments, characters like Sofia and Bruno, unique outfits, and new hoverboards. Collect city-specific items during Weekly Hunts for rewards.

How to Play Subway Surfers: Buenos Aires?

  • Swipe Controls: Swipe up to jump, down to roll, left/right to switch lanes.
  • Collect Coins & City Tokens: Gather coins, themed collectibles, and other items to unlock Weekly Hunt rewards like hoverboards and keys.
  • Dodge Obstacles: Avoid trains, barriers, and Buenos Aires-themed hazards while maintaining your run.
  • Use Power-Ups: Activate magnets, jetpacks, and hoverboards to extend your run and maximize your score.

Why Play Subway Surfers: Buenos Aires Unblocked?

Experience the lively streets of Buenos Aires in Subway Surfers: Buenos Aires online without restrictions, unlock new characters, outfits, boards, and city-themed collectibles.

Key Features

  • Buenos Aires Environment: Explore famous streets, cultural landmarks, and local architecture.
  • Exclusive Characters & Boards: Play as Sofia and Bruno with unique city-themed hoverboards.
  • Endless Runner Gameplay: Classic swipe-based controls with a Buenos Aires twist.
  • Special Collectibles: Participate in Weekly Hunts for city-specific rewards.
  • Unblocked Online: Play instantly in your browser anywhere.

Master Buenos Aires' Subway Tracks!

Run, jump, and slide through Subway Surfers: Buenos Aires to beat obstacles, collect rewards, and enjoy the vibrant Argentinian city environment!
